pages.text: Sometimes you just want to clear large amounts of space, and care little for the materials that currently occupy it. In this case, a $(item)Tome of Destruction$() can help, as it efficiently clears space, whilst voiding anything that would otherwise drop.$(br)Can Undo the single most recent action.

pages.heading: Tome of Destruction
pages.description: Hold $(k:settings_menu) to toggle settings. Shift-Right-Click in midair to configure area to void.

pages.title: Modes/Settings
pages.text: $(l)Show Overlay:$() Toggle to Enable/Disable the preview showing which blocks will be voided.$(br)$(l)Anchor:$() Toggle to hold the preview in place, allowing you to move around and check before finalizing destruction.$(br)$(l)Raytrace Fluid:$() Toggle on to allow exchanging of fluids.$(br)$(l)Connected Area:$() Toggle to only exchange blocks physically connected to the block clicked.
